field.label: Enable Maltrail Sensor
field.help: This will activate the Sensor. Do not forget to enable the local server mode or send the logs to a remote server.

field.label: Number of processes
field.help: Number of processes for sensor. Default 1.

field.label: Disable CPU affinity
field.help: Disable setting of CPU affinity (with schedtool) on Linux machines (e.g. because of load issues with other processes). Default not set.

field.label: Use feeds in trail updates
field.help: Use feeds (too) in trail updates. Default set.

field.label: Disable specified feeds
field.help: Disable (retrieval from) specified feeds (Note: respective .py files inside /trails/feeds; turris and ciarmy/cinsscore seem to be too "noisy" lately; policeman is old and produces lots of false positives). Default: turris, ciarmy, policeman, myip, alienvault

field.label: IP minimum in feeds
field.help: Ignore IPs that appear on lower than IP_MINIMUM_FEEDS number of feeds (Note: static IP trails are always included). Default: 3

field.label: Disable trails based on regular expression
field.help: Disable trails based on the following regular expression run against the corresponding info. Default not set.

field.label: Update Period(seconds)
field.help: Update trails after every given period (seconds). Default 86400

field.label: Custom feed URL
field.help: Use remote custom feed (too) in trail updates. Default not set.

field.label: Capture Buffer Size
field.help: Size of the ring buffer (in MB) to memory-map into the sensor processes for sharing captured network traffic. An undersized buffer may reduce detection rates. Defaults to 10% of available RAM when left blank.

field.label: Monitor Interface
field.help: List of interface to listen on, none means listen on all interfaces.

field.label: Capture All
field.help: This will look into all IPv4 and IPv6 traffic. If disabled it will only look for traffic for icmp, udp, tcp syn packets and on known HTTP ports.

field.label: Sensor Name
field.help: Sensor name to appear in produced logs. Default: $HOSTNAME

field.label: Remote Server
field.help: IP address of the remote logging server.

field.label: Remote Port
field.help: Port of the logging server.

field.label: Syslog Server
field.help: IP address of the remote syslog server.

field.label: Syslog Port
field.help: Port of the syslog server.

field.label: Remote Server for JSON events
field.help: Remote address to send JSON events (e.g. Logstash)

field.label: Remote Server for JSON events Port
field.help: Port of Logstash Server

field.label: Regular expression for severity to syslog or logstash servers
field.help: Regular expression used for calculating severity attribute when sending events to SYSLOG_SERVER or LOGSTASH_SERVER.

field.label: Disable local log storage
field.help: Set only (!) in cases when LOG_SERVER should be exclusively used for log storage. IMPORTANT: With this check you can't see logs in Log section of Maltrail. Default not set.

field.label: Remote address for trail definitions
field.help: Remote address for pulling (latest) trail definitions (e.g. http://192.168.2.107:8338/trails). USE_SERVER_UPDATE_TRAILS directive should be active in [Server] parameters. Default blank field.

field.label: Use Heuristics
field.help: Whether to enable or disable the usage or heuristic detection.

field.label: Check missing host
field.help: Capture HTTP requests with missing Host header (introducing potential false positives). Default not set.

field.label: Check Hostheaders
field.help: Check values in Host header (along with standard non-HTTP checks) for malicious DNS trails (introducing greater number of events). Default not set.

field.label: Whitelist
field.help: Here you can whitelist IP addresses or domains.

field.label: Ignore events list
field.help: Here you can ignore events. In this sintax src_ip;src_port;dst_ip;dst_port Esemples in /usr/local/share/maltrail/misc/ignore_events.txt

field.label: Regular expression to ignore events
field.help: Regular expression to be used against the whole event entry to be ignored. Default not set. Exemple: IGNORE_EVENTS_REGEX sql injection|long domain|117.21.225.3|sinkhole

field.label: Blacklist
field.help: Here you can set IP addresses or domains as blacklist event.
